children.subject:
"Is it possible to be both a 20hr TA and an 8hr reader at the same time?"

I believe EECS only allows a single appointment a semester

"are undergrads allowed to work >50% over the semester?"

Definitely not if you're an international student, if you're not then it used to be possible if you petitioned for it/filled out some paperwork. Not sure if that's still the case.

history.content: You would need to convince both of the instructors of these two courses that it would be in their best interests to have you do this (and this has become a hard sell, since people have dropped out of dual positions), plus you would need to convince a Dean that this was in your academic interest. So the answer is, probably not.
Is it possible to be both a 20hr TA and an 8hr reader at the same time? Besides the new restrictions on holding two positions, are undergrads allowed to work >50% over the semester?
history.subject: Holding 20hr TA position + 8hr Reader
